title: Peas

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, choose either a role or player. The town will be notified to speak now about the chosen topic or forever hold their peas. One hour later, until the end of the day, if someone mentions that role/players, deal them a Powerful attack immediately

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Trick two people into not holding their peas

desc:
